title: Can't purchase skins
body:

You should be able to purchase this through the in-game store.  It doesn't look to be updated through the splash pages of the updated client yet.  Let me know if that clears things up!
That is a [legacy ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)skin so it isn't available for purchase in the store all the time.

Purchasing skins while in the collections tab isn't a enabled in the new client yet.  If you go to the store you can see and purchase all available skins.
